venue.name: Hess Gas - Intersection Mass Pike, Rt 128, and Commonwealth Ave

item.description:
So you're itching to ride, but not ready for Provincetown?

Join me on a ride from the Hess in Newton up through the back roads of Weston, to Route 117 and head west for the Wachusett Reservoir. The Reservoir offers stunning views as it is melting in the late winter sun, a great photo op! We will go around and then make our way to Coral Seafood in Marlborough for some of the best clam chowda around.

Meet at Hess at 10AM - Gas & Go at 10:15 Running late? 617-584-4797, Know you will miss us? Head for Rt 117 West, we will stop at DD in Concord for 15 min (aprox 10:45-11:00)

As the "Season" is not officially open yet as far as the club is concerned, this is an open ride to touring members and non-touring members.

Hope to see you there!

Paul
item.name: Wachusett Ramble
